reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this place! This local business makes you feel like family. The entire staff is so welcoming and the food is fantastic! I always look forward to enjoy a meal at Johnnys. Truly the best neighbours restaurant. They really know how to feed ya! Highly recommend !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anna, Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We appreciate your kind words and are so glad that you had a great experience with us. We strive to provide the best customer service, and we re glad to hear that we succeeded. Thanks again!

reviews.review_text: I had an absolutely fantastic dining experience at Johnny s  on Oak today. I made a unique order of 2 chicken breasts with spanakopita, salad, and extra tzatziki sauce. Despite this not being a standard menu item, Connie, who provided impeccable service, went above and beyond to convey my requests to Johnny. Without hesitation, they not only fulfilled but also surpassed all my culinary expectations. Having worked in the restaurant industry during my young adulthood and even having had an 8-year connection to a Greek family, my standards are exceptionally high. The chicken was impeccably moist and flavorful, while the spanakopita boasted a perfectly flaky exterior with a delectably moist and delicious filling. I requested a little extra tzatziki, and Connie promptly delivered it with a welcoming smile. In summary, my dining experience at Johnny s on Oak was nothing short of delectable, and I left thoroughly satisfied. The combination of superb food, exceptional service, and the willingness to accommodate unique requests truly made this visit unforgettable. Kid-friendliness: I noticed a couple of families in the restaurant during my visit.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Fuad, Thank you for the 5 star review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you back very soon .

reviews.review_text: We love Johnnys aka best neighbours :) We tried the fried chicken with truffle honey for the first time and it was awesome. Got a spanakopita and a ham and pineapple pizza and it s like I had a slice of a memory. My family has been eating here since I think 1990 maybe before that and Alex and Kathy were the owners, now it s their son Johnny and his wife Connie and they too are such lovely people. I have also worked here when I was 18/19 years old and it was a pretty fun job.  I have had my fair share of pizza here, but I think it s to be noted that it still tastes just as good as it did 35 years ago. See you guys soon :)

My wife and I stopped in while at BC childrens to get a bite and some air. The service was fantastic and the food hit the spot. We ended up back there the following night and ordered from them the two nights after. Would definitely return and cant wait for the baked spaghetti tonight!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Peter, Thank you so much for your 5-star review! We will share this with the staff to let them know to keep up the amazing work.

reviews.review_text: The food was amazing the owner offered us free desert but 2 of us were to full so the 3rd got a cheesecake slice
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Brian , Thank you so much for your 5-star review! We will share this with the staff to let them know to keep up the amazing work! We hope to see you again very soon.

reviews.review_text: The best grilled meat I ve had in years! I had Chicken souvlaki and loved it. The salad had lots of feta and all good Greek salad ingredients. I m sorry I didn t take a photo.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kathleen, We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your chicken souvlaki. We hope to see you back very soon!

reviews.review_text: A neighbourhood gem.  Im so glad i finally tried it out. This family-run restaurant is so much more enjoyable than a chain. The food was terrific, really flavourful and perfectly prepared.  The portions were substantial.  Our waitress, Sophia, was lovely and helpful with recommendations. Will I be back?  Most definitely.  I cant wait to try some of the other menu items.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, thank you for the review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your experience with us and hope to see you back very soon.

reviews.review_text: Food was amazing. Its hard to find a place that serves a rare stake (I like it bleeding). We had a great experience. Didnt love the chocolate cake, but it wasnt bad. Will come back for sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Daniela, thank you for the review ! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your steak and hope to see you back soon.

reviews.review_text: We came in as a very large party, they went over and above to accommodate us and I don t know how they did it, but every single person got their food at the same time AND it was warm AND absolutely amazing. If I could give more than 5 stars I would. Also - I am celiac and they had lots of options!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tara, Thank you for the review, we are happy to hear your party enjoyed their meal . We will let the team know to keep up the great work and we hope to see you back very soon!

reviews.review_text: Great neighbourhood restaurant with great good and great people
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi John, Thank you for the kind review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time at Johnny s on oak and hope to see you back very soon!

reviews.review_text: We are here almost every week! There is something for everyone in our family ranging from the 3 year old to their vegetarian dad (Jonny s keeps adding vegan and vegetarian options). On top of the food being good everyone who works there is super friendly. If you haven t been you should check it out! Vegetarian options: The vegetarian menu keeps expanding. Try the Eggplant Parmesan- it s great. Dietary restrictions: They have vegan and vegetarian options and are happy to modify. Kid-friendliness: They are really nice to our kids who, for better or worse, feel at home when we go there. They are also happy to give the kids free candy at the end of the meal. Wheelchair accessibility: We often see people in wheelchairs so it must be very accessible.
Fantastic food. Awesome service. The steak is top notch. Would recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Earl, thank you for the review . We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your steak, and we hope to see you back soon !

reviews.review_text: Neighborhood food gem! We ordered and got a feast delivered. Honest yummy casual fare made with love. Thanks Johnny s on Oak!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Vanessa, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a 5-star review. We hope to deliver again to you very soon !

reviews.review_text: Not often I write a review. Johnnys on Oak is a haven of great food  . Great wine and a great place to schmooze with friend or go on a romantic date or just be peaceful by yourself. My personal favourites are the Roast Lamb and the baked spaghetti. For desert nothing beats the Baclava ice cream. Yes friends this is the only place on the planet that serves this tasty desert. Well worth a try  .. sweet like Connie Johnnies wife and cute like Bonnie Connie and Johnnies baby. This place is where I take my lady for a lovely evening meal. All folder than good . Douglas

Always great service, the food is scrumptious and the atmosphere is very calm and friendly.  My favourite pizza place. Vegetarian options: There is always opposition. Kid-friendliness: There always seems to be a family with children, the children seem happy to be there. Wheelchair accessibility: No stairs, and tables are spacious with lots of manoeuvring room.

Food was delicious. We had the Gyro and pizza. The pizza was layered which was amazing and the service was great. Will definitely be back! 10/10 thank you to Johnny and all the staff for a great evening experience
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi David, thank you for the amazing review ! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you back very soon.

reviews.review_text: I had an amazing experience today at this restaurant. The food was just another level, OMG, so good!! I tried the shrimp tacos and Gosh, the salsa and the shrimp were so tasty. The Caesar salad and chicken was delicious, paired with good house white wine. Johnny and Conny made me feel like home, both are exceptional and allowed me to try one of their dessert made by them. I will highly recommend this place, its just top notch! Ill be back soon!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rene , thank you for kind review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us today, it was a pleasure serving you and we hope to see you back again very soon .

reviews.review_text: Great food and warm; friendly neighborhood vibes! We live nearby and received a flyer that was nicely timed with our return home with our newborn. Being hungry, we loaded up the stroller and made a b-line for Johnny s along with another couple, their stroller and baby. I mention our composition as Johnny s is very welcoming to young families with strollers. We started with a Johnny s Special pizza for the table and it was on point with a great crust. At the table for entrees were two roast lamb dinners, a moussaka and a lasagna dinner. Everyone s food was tasty and filling. The service was very kind and warm and the vibe was most definitely care and welcoming. We will be back and this is our new go to!

Delicious pizza, fast and courteous service, love the layout and overall feel of the place. Really good pizza had a bbq chicken and meat lovers kinda styled pizza mmmm good. On a previous visit I had the calamari also real tasty. Kid-friendliness: I brought my 12 year old there and she liked it too. Wheelchair accessibility: No steps whatsoever.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Brionne, Thank you for the 5 star review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed the pizza and kalamari. We hope to see you back very soon.

reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised. The restaurant was renovated and it looked great.  Our server was friendly and efficient.  The Calamari was excellent.  I was surprised that it was such a large portion. Johnnys on Oak does not skimp on their portions.  I had the baked spaghetti and my friend had the mousaka. We both had leftovers. We would go back for sure.

Stopped in today for lunch with the family. Literally some of the best food I ve ever had anywhere, loved the atmosphere as well. Ordered Calamari (it was cooked to perfection) the taztziki was delicious too, also had a Greek Salad for us to share, dressing was light & simple exactly how a Greek dressing should be! These were just our appies... for the main we decided on pizza....  it was to die for :) again some of the best I ve had anywhere! Perfectly sauced, quality mozzarella, and my idea of the best crust, crispy on the outside, soft on the inside not too thick and doughy at all!  The server was absolutely fantastic even gave us some free lemon pound cake for dessert!! The prices and portions were perfect... anytime I m in this area I ll be sure to stop in for a bite!!

We dont live in Vancouver but every time we visit our friends in the heighbourhood we make sure to include a visit to Jonny,s for the best pizza in BC. The renovation looks great and the service is attentive and efficient. We will be back probably this Sunday. Parking: Sometimes you can fiind free parking on 23rd and 22nd.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Loraine, We really appreciate you taking the time to share your rating with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Amazing atmosphere.  Fast service...good  cook/tasty food.  big portions...  Comedy show was great.... good value for the money .......
Great restaurant, pleasantly surprised with the quality, food, and the service from our waitress Sophia. Definitely will be returning in the future for more great food and service!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jared, Thank you for the review ! We will let Sophia know to keep up the great work and we hope to see you back very soon!

reviews.review_text: Came for a late lunch, and was pleasantly surprised. Good service, kind staff. The food was good, the calamari was my favourite. When I asked for takeout, they didn t have the cut of steak I wanted due to late delivery, so they offered a better one for the same price. Great!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Elizabeth, We really appreciate you taking the time to share your rating with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Ordered Roast Lamb dinner for 30 people for a 90th birthday. It was done family style, huge portions and great food. The lamb was tender and juicy, rice al dente and the potatoes were amazing. Great food and great value Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael , Thank you for the review . It was a pleasure to cater your party and we hope to see you back very soon!

reviews.review_text: Wife and I went and we really enjoyed the atmosphere here. It is a full step above a basic sports bar/pub offering great Greek food, nice music, and a freshly renovated interior. The large pizzas can easily feed 4 people and they bring them out on a raised serving platter. Happy hour ends at 5pm. Also the Greek deserts are amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi David , Thank you for the kind review we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and we hope to see you back again very soon !

reviews.review_text: Went to Johnny s specifically to get Saganaki and was not disappointed at all! Had that and a jug of beer with a pal and had a great time. Great service, cool atmosphere, and awesome food and beer!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Patrick , thank you for the kind review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your time at Johnny s on Oak and hope to see you back very soon !

reviews.review_text: Service is always immaculate. Pints are to die for! My server Kailyn recommended the Greek ribs tonight and they were amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nigel, thank you for the review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the Greek ribs and hope to see you back soon.

reviews.review_text: Baked spaghetti with veggie sauce is AMAZING - you can swap out the meat sauce on all their pastas and the veggie sauce is so so so good. Friendly staff and super clean too. Thank you! Vegetarian options: Amazing veggie pasta sauce!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lisa , thank you for the review ! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the baked spaghetti. We hope to see you back very soon .

reviews.review_text: Johnny is fantastic and his foods tastes amazing!! He caters our group meetings and we now finally look forward to them happening. Great food and great service!
Johnny s has extraordinary options for healthy food which is great for my lifestyle! It allows me to enjoy a good date night but not feel guilty afterward!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Collette, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and we would love to have you back soon!

reviews.review_text: Came here after our slo pitch game for a beer and stayed for a pizza plus more beer.  Fantastic service,  top notch pizzas and very cozy bathrooms. HIT & Miss (our ball team) will definitely be coming back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Richy, Thank you for the review ! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your pizza and beer. We hope to see your group back again soon !

reviews.review_text: Johnny s has become my neighbourhood restaurant and we always get great food and service. Thanks to Sophia for today s burger and brew special!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Neil, Thank you for the review. We will let Sophia know to keep up the great work !

reviews.review_text: Good food good service. Taco looks bad but actually taste good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello , thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the food and the service we hope to see you back very soon !

reviews.review_text: Great old style pizza. Thick and heavy with toppings and cheese. A throwback to the days before Neapolitan thin crust.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sil, Thank you for the review ! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your pizza and we hope to see you back very soon.

reviews.review_text: We had a great time at Johnnys. Charming place, affordable drinks, very good happy hour, nice atmosphere. Great little neighbourhood spot. Didnt try the pizza but it looked and smelled delicious
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jake, thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us . We hope to see you back soon so you can try the pizza!

reviews.review_text: It s a good family restaurant in west side of Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for the kind review. We hope to see you back very soon!

reviews.review_text: Johnnys on oak is one of my favorite places to go to in Vancouver. The pizza  atmosphere is fantastic. Johnny and Connie are the owners of this quaint warm place. Thankyou! Guys.

First time dining here Had calamari here was delicious. The steak was sent back, but our server and the owner came and genuinely cared about the dining experience, so it was remade and done how I d liked. The service was too notch!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi TC, Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. We hope to see you again very soon !

reviews.review_text: Amazing food and hospitality and the best cold Stella in town!! Thank you for our conversation and your kind words while my Daughter recovers at the amazing BCCH.   Cheers-Buck from the Yukon.
Loved the salad and the chicken! Definitely gonna come back and order! Highly recommend this place
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you so much for your kind words! We really appreciate your positive review and it was great to have you as a customer. We look forward to serving you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Came here on a Thursday after softball with a group of 8.  Service was prompt.  Pizza was fantastic.  No issues.  Will be returning.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Kelly, Thank you for the review it was a pleasure to serve your group we hope to see you back soon!

reviews.review_text: Best burger I ever had. The fish and chips is excellent too.
Great food, friendly staff. What more could you ask for.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Chad, thank you for the review! We hope to see you back very soon.

reviews.review_text: Delicious pizza. Friendly/ fast service. Cute little place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Leighton, We are happy to hear you enjoyed your pizza, and we hope to see you again very soon!

reviews.review_text: Our first time in Vancouver. Found Johnnys online and were very glad we gave it a try! The food was amazing!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sherry, Thank you for the kind review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Johnny s and hope to see you back your next time in Vancouver !

reviews.review_text: Steak was very good and service was great. Our server Sophia was very helpful.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mason, thank you for the review! We hope to see you back very soon.

reviews.review_text: Incredible authentic Greek food and unbelievable service! Thank you for such an excellent experience!
Recently renovated. Family owned. I am a fan of the old school food. If you love good food, this would be a great choice. Took the kids, and wife. We all agreed, very good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Burt, Thank  you so much for your generous feedback, Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: The veggie lovers pizza is superb. A great blend of vegetables including lots of garlic and artichokes. Great service from Alyssa and Stella. Some say this is the best pizza in Vancouver. Vegetarian options: Lots of good options but love that veggie  supreme !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi David, Thank you so much for your 5-star review! We will share this with the team to let them know to keep up the amazing work .

reviews.review_text: This place is a hidden gem where, not only can you get food made with passion and love, you are also treated with 5 star service from the waiting staff. I went today on Fathers Day, which you can imagine is testing the strengths and weaknesses of any establishment, but these people made my day. I will definitely be going back, cant wait to try some of the other dishes and soak up the amazing environment that is Johnnys!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andrew ! Thank you for sharing your experience with us ! We hope to see you again very soon .

reviews.review_text: Great food and service. Good prices and our service was perfect. We ll be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi padraic, Thank you for the review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your experience with us we hope to see you back soon !

reviews.review_text: Best restaurant in Vancouver we ve tasted a few A+ dishes canneloni (spinach, beef, tomato sauce and cheese), greek kalamari and roast lamb and today the wangyu beef burguer. The portions are generous and feels healthy food when is made of the best quality and presentation. Can t wait to try more of their variety. Thankful for this type of diner restaurant I ordered online but we will come in person soon I am sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karina, thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your meal. We hope to see you in the restaurant very soon !

reviews.review_text: Pizza is excellent. Great local spot. Owners are friendly and attentive.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lyndsay, Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your pizza, we hope to see you back again very soon !

reviews.review_text: The steaks were done so perfectly and the pizza was to die for, this restaurant is a pleasant surprise in a rather sleepy neighbourhood
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Eric , thank you for the review . We hope to see you back very soon !

reviews.review_text: Really nice environment, food was great Sofia was an excellent server
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Grace, Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us and hope to see you back very soon .

reviews.review_text: Hard to complain. Service was excellent, price was good, food was good. Would happily return. Happy to see a place in this area keeping going, I unfortunately feel the Cambie/Fairview area is suffering lately.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Brian, thank you for the 5 star review! We appreciate your support and hope to see you back very soon.

reviews.review_text: Went there for a special event and it was great. The old-school pizza that reminded me of the 90s (thicker crunchy crust, not quite deep dish) was great. Service was good and drink selection was decent. Parking: Street parking
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karen , thank you for the review. We thank you for the support and hope to see you again soon !

reviews.review_text: The service here is great, the Greek salad and chicken was incredible. They didn t over do the red onion and there was no leafy greens and the beer was delicious! It exceeded my expectations by far!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Aaron , thank you for the amazing review . It was a pleasure serving you and we hope to see you back very soon !

reviews.review_text: My family and I had an excellent experience here. The food was delicious and the staff were very friendly and helpful. My steak was amazing and I also ordered some ribs to go, which I highly recommend. Oh and the wife also wanted a pizza to go which didnt last long at home. I will definitely be back to this restaurant. Thanks guys for the great dinner! 5
An Amazing Evening! The Blonde girl was amazing!

My Girlfriend and I just finished the Mediterranean beef and chicken dish, and we are both on cloud nine as its the most delicious Greek dish in the city. Weve been coming here for years and the quality and the service is exemplary!!! We give it a 12 out of 10, best Greek food and pizza!
Great food, great catering, lovely vibes. Highly recommend Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Katie, We are happy to hear you enjoyed the catering we hope to see you again very soon !

reviews.review_text: We got in late from out of town and our 3 year old was super hungry so we ordered from this restaurant for the first time. They delivered our food so quickly and included a baklava and drinks (which we didnt expect and was so nice!) Our picky 3 year old said he loved the lasagna and finished his plate, we all ended up eating together and very much enjoyed our meal. Will order from them again and would highly recommend to everyone!! Great service and amazing food.
Great service by the owner Connie, and the food was spectacular we all enjoyed our food and everything was perfect bottle of wine and Tequila shots .Thank you for making our special night.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Meena, thank you for the amazing review . We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your experience with us and hope to see you back very soon !

reviews.review_text: The owners were very friendly, comfy chairs and good ambience. Food was incredible, had the roast lamb, calamari, and honey truffle chicken. Best restaurant experience Ive had in a while.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Steve , thank you for the kind review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us we hope to see you back very soon. Thank you for the support!

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and great service.  Try the Mac and cheese.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello, Thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the Mac and cheese, and we will let the staff know to keep up the good work!

reviews.review_text: We wandered into Johnny s before attending the Vancouver Canadians game.  Connie, our server greeted us with a big smile and turned out to be fantastic !   Attentive, friendly and engaging.    The menu had plenty of options, chicken souvlaki was delicious.   Bathroom cleanliness is my gauge of care for a restaurant and Johnny s had fresh decor and cleanliness.   This is now our go to spot for pregame and have discovered all the staff are fantastic
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Wendy , thank you for the amazing review we are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time at Johnny s On Oak we hope to see you again before the next Canadians Game !

reviews.review_text: Great service. Good people. Very warm environment for going out on a date. I ve been here twice so far and I ll be back again. Had the new York steak with lasagna which was cooked to perfection. I ve also had the wagyu ragu which was delicious. The calamari wasn t over done and it was crispy and fresh. Cheesecake with homemade jam recipe was to die for. Would recommend over and over again. Thanks Johnny!
A great little neighborhood restaurant. The pizza is great for takeout or delivery!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Brent , thank you for the review. We hope to see you back again soon !

reviews.review_text: The food was delicious, and the service was to match! We will be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Martin , thank you for the 5 star review ! We hope to see you back again very soon.

reviews.review_text: Great family table atmosphere. Pizza is some of the best in the city. Warm friendly staff and a very personable owner. One of my go-to places in Vancouver!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello thank you for the review ! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience at Johnny s On Oak we hope to see you back soon.

reviews.review_text: Got in right away, greeted with a smile.  Great selection of different cuisines.  It feels like Johnny himself must be making this food because you can taste the love.  It is consistent and has great draught beer. Come give it a try

We love this place! Happy hour wine is fantastic and the food is always consistent and delicious.  Staff makes the place, Eva is a lovely server and awesome! Had her a few times now and she makes the experience so enjoyable. I highly recommend for Greek and pizza!
Johnny makes steak how you order it. Pizza crust is excellent!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Andy , thank you for the review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your steak and pizza. We hope you can join us again very soon !

reviews.review_text: I stopped by for lunch today. The whole place has been fully remodelled during Covid and looks really good. I recently discovered Johnnys pizza for my family but I ordered lasagna for myself today for the first time. I have had dozens of lasagnas in as many restaurants and this is in the top 5. It was that good! Tasty sauce, lots of great cheese, good meat, perfect noodles and baked perfectly. Loved it. The server was very friendly too. Ill keep going back here for pizza and lasagna.
Thank you Johnny s on Oak for making our evening awesome! You went out if your way to accommodate our large group of 30+ people. Food and service was excellent!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michelle, thank you for the review it was great to host your party we hope to see you back again very soon !

reviews.review_text: First time here since Neighbours Restaurant. We ordered the kalamari dinner and Greek ribs. Both dishes were plentiful and very good. You wont leave hungry. The service was friendly and attentive. We will be back.

Theres a positive buzz going around town about this place.... so I went in to try it out.  I had the Wagyu Beef Burger and it was without-a-doubt the best burger Ive ever eaten......it was so tender and flavourful!! I cant wait to come back and try more items on the menu.  The serving staff is very friendly and detailed.  Even the owner came out to ask how the meal was.   SUPERB, AMAZING... will definitely be back.

I have eaten from this restaurant several times dine in and take out and have waited to post a review until I tried many different things so I could give an honest review and not just a one off experience. Hands down this is one of the most consistent places I have eaten from! Doesn t matter if I dine in, pick up or get it delivered. The establishment looks are warm and inviting. Good space between tables to feel  covid safe . The staff are prompt, very attentive and I just love their  friendly like family  demeanour. And what can I say . THE FOOD IS SIMPLY AMAZING! All the traditional Greek dishes and authentic and delicious. The French Onion soup is to die for. The Ahi Tuna is a fave for me. The fried chicken burger you won t find a better one. And did I mention . THE PIZZA? Only downfall which isn t even a big deal is I wish the patio was bigger for those warm summer nights. What more can I say? Just go!
So happy we decided on a whim to come here for lunch.  Amazing service, top-notch pizza, and great atmosphere. So good we ordered takeout for dinner.  We will definitely be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sue , thank you for the review we appreciate your support and hope to see you back very soon !

reviews.review_text: It s a good place if you want to go with your family and everyone wants different food,the menu has a variety of different options,and all we have tried were very delicious.we had chicken Parmesan,burger and spinach for appetizer,the lady who was working there was super friendly,highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Minoo, thank you for review we are happy that you enjoyed your experience with us we hope to see you back very soon !

reviews.review_text: Great chicken burger and best fries  I ve had !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jonathan , thank you for the review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your chicken burger . We hope to see you back again soon !!

reviews.review_text: Food is 10/10 and the service is even better. Always make you feel welcomed. Staff are exceptional and attentive. Would highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lee, thank you for the kind review we hope to see you back very soon!

reviews.review_text: Exceptional Food & Portions!!! Superb Tasting Beef & Chicken Solvalaki was So Delicious. Just wish We had Bigger or ordered lots more Tzatziki Sauce! Was our first time we didnt expect to have to have to order Extra Tzatziki Sauce? Amazing Staff ... lots of Help & Smiles         Got an Take Out Menu to Order Again...Thank goodness

Had a wonderful experience for our first time coming to this place for dinner. 2 suggestions if I may say . 1 for the heated cheese dish which was delicious that we both agree on, maybe put the lemon juice on the side for the customer to pour how much they would like in it without the seeds. 2nd one was the kalimari dish. It was light and fluffy and very well executed but maybe punch the onions though a dicer for a uniform presentation. Unless you going for the rustic finish then great. looks and tastes good too. Our mains were perfect and everything was cooked well to perfection. Thank you and have a wonderful evening .

Its Superbowl and we ordered the Potato Skins.  OMG!  They were super delicious and my daughters had to have seconds.  They were super professional and it was nice to support a nice local family restaurant.  In addition, it was a nice surprise they put in two free pop for my take out order.  Thank you!

Monday Labour Day I had family come into Vancouver. I went to visit them at their hotel and one of them decided that we should go to Johnny s on Oak. He read on line that they had the best pizza. I was in. We met a friend up there and after an awesome night I have to say I was quite amazed. I have worked in the hospitality for a long time, so it takes a lot to impress me. I have to say...we were greeted immediately at the door by two servers...the owner even greeted us. They help us find a nice table. The service was fast, efficient and they anticipated all our needs. The atmosphere was fun...great music and all the other customers seemed to be having fun. I would say that all the customers knew the owner. It was like a neighbourhood restaurant. The served looked professional. They didn t forget a thing. The pizza was amazing...thick, cheesy with a lot of toppings and so was the Greek salad and desserts. The beer was cold and the drinks were exactly what we ordered. They checked on our table many times and the servers were friendly. The owner gave us free dessert and he asked us how everything was? Yes, I am happy to write this great review!!! Congratulations to them! All the best in the future! I will definitely go back and I highly recommend!

Well our daughter spent many months at Childrens Hospital this was one of our favourite places to go   , the lasagna and wings are delicious   one of the best family-owned restaurants around town . My daughter took a liking to the owner , and she stuffed her under her wing   ! Thank you Johnny and Connie !  You are the best !  So if youre in the neighbourhood come check this place out
Johnny and Connie bringing you some of the best food youll ever have. All I can say is that Im ruined for getting pizza anywhere else. But I thank you for that, great job
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mark, thank you for the kind review we hope to see you back soon !

reviews.review_text: Andreas service was impeccable, highly recommended. Food was amazing, cant wait to come back again! Great food great staff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Devin, thank you for the review we hope to see you back again very soon !

reviews.review_text: One of my new favourite places to go after a hard days work The food is amazing! Friendly staff. I highly recommend the wagyu beef tacos at happy hour and their Saganaki is one of the best I ve ever had. Additionally. It s been about a year or more now. Just had one of the best steaks I ve ever had.  7oz New York Perfectly cooked. Sooo tasty. Wish I had tried the steaks a long time ago. My friends saw mine and ordered one too.
5 stars. that s all I can say. top notch beer, food , and waitresses. Stop into this little hidden gem when you re in the area ! PS Johnny is a beast
Friendly environment! Delicious food, healthy and great service!

Weve been coming here for years and we had another great experience. With two little ones asleep in the car we ordered takeout(again). Everything was delicious! The staff is always courteous and the food is consistently great. Go find your new favorite menu item. See you soon!
Best pizza+fries combo in the city. Proper proportions as well.
Staff was incredibly friendly, food was fantastic, and the restaurant was classy inside.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rebecca, thank you for the kind review . We hope to see you back again soon !

reviews.review_text: Great meal!  Havent had pizza   this good since I was a kid.
Me and my friends come here all the time after work and it s the perfect spot for wine and pizza. The pizza is to die for and the staff is amazing. Highly recommend!!!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Parth, Thank you for the amazing   review. We hope to see you and your friends again soon !
